body.name: X3 Mop XL, Separates Dirty and Clean Water, 3-Chamber Design, Flat Mop and Bucket Set, Hands Free Home Floor Cleaning, 3 Reusable Microfiber Mop Pads Included
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 45 mins
features: 🌟 35% LARGER DESIGN: Cover more ground and get your cleaning done faster with our expansive mop head! The X3 Mop XL ensures you spend less time mopping and more time enjoying a clean home.

💧 REVOLUTIONARY WATER SEPARATION SYSTEM: Experience the first-ever mop designed to keep clean and dirty water separate! This unique feature ensures that you're always cleaning with fresh water, avoiding the spreading of dirt and grime.
🛡️LIFETIME REPLACEMENT GUARANTEE: yes that's right! If anything happens to your X3 Mop we will replace it for free, for life!
♻️ REUSABLE MICROFIBER PADS: Say goodbye to wasteful disposable pads. Our high-quality microfiber pads are reusable, ensuring a clean sweep every time while being eco-friendly! (3 Pads Included)
🌀 360-DEGREE HEAD ROTATION: Navigating around furniture or tight spots? No problem! The X3 Mop XL's full-circle rotation ensures you easily get into every nook and cranny.
Wet or Dry Usage: Use wet for a deep clean or dry for dusting floors, ceilings, windows, and other surfaces.
For X3 Mop XL refill pads search asin B0CHDBPNZR

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for apartment living
reviews.reviewText: Ok, I will be honest, I was ready to return the item but after using the system a bunch of times, I am totally converted. First of all, if you are reading reviews about the pole seeming weak or like it is going to break, that means the person did not follow the directions properly when it was assembled. The pole assembly is in a specific direction and if not done correctly, it will indeed feel like it is going to break. Once assembled properly it is very strong. Second, even though the bucket is not that big, it means it is light enough to carry and the square shape means it will be super easy to store. Third, in spite of the small bucket, a little goes a LONG way because the system separates the dirty water. Fourth, the mop lies flat so you can easily mop under dressers and beds. Fifth, the mop comes with an extender so it’s great for taller people or to clean walls.Yes it is annoying that you have to rotate the head to clean both ends but I’d rather do that than constantly clean out the bucket. Yes the mechanism is a little stiff at first but with use, it gets easier and easier to clean the head.The pads also seem better at scrubbing the floors compared to other mop systems and it’s great that this comes with extra pads.I am quite happy with this product even though I initially felt it was too much to spend on a mop. As an apartment dweller, this system works well for my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have bought so many spin mops and they have not lasted very long. By far this is the best mop I have used. I have a bad back and can't bend very far. This was a life saver in keeping my floors clean. And it still amazes me how us don't have to put the mop head in dirty water each time. It is so easy. It's the best thing for little old ladies who have trouble getting around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It really does separate dirty from clean water
reviews.reviewText: This mop is a good size, not too big or heavy. It comes with 3 pads which is nice. When you put the mop in the middle chamber it scrapes the water into the dirty side when you push down and you get clean water when you pull up. This mechanism is rough and I’m not sure how long it will last. All in all I like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the idea of this mop. It’s great on the walls and I love the seperate water chambers.A few things I don’t like but can over look:The mop rod keeps unhooking. This is annoying but I can overlook it, it’s an easy fast fix.The chamber you put the pad in to get clean water does get a bit dirty but not as bad as if it’s all one bucket.The last thing which I can’t seem to get over is all my mop pads are ripping. The center edge where you dunk it in the water has shredded on 2 of the pads which makes it extremely hard to use. Also it’s been less then a month… I’m not really sure how to get replacements, I don’t feel like I should have to pay for them. But I don’t want to return the whole thing either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek product with good use case. Simple and effective
reviews.reviewText: This product works great and as intended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This mop is different than others....
reviews.reviewText: It really does separate the clean water from the dirty water. It does this by scraping the dirty water off and depositing it in a dirty side then you move the mop over to the clean side and refresh the mop with clean water. It's a little on the drier side - like a well wrung out regular mop, but on today's floors that's probably a good thing. It comes with a lifetime guarantee, but I don't think it's worth much. Their website is closed down and they don't respond to emails. The pads that you use to clean with started hanging up when I was getting more water, and when I looked they were starting to rip at the seems where they're held on to the mop. I don't think they'll last too long, but so far I've been pleased with this and would recommend, even though it is quite pricey.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Who knew I liked to mop!?!
reviews.reviewText: For me, $70 was a major investment in a mop and I was afraid it wouldn’t be worth it. So far it is. I have never … I mean NEVER enjoyed mopping before. Now, I find it so immensely satisfying to see that nasty water separate to another compartment so that I can then refill the mop with clean water. Don’t judge…but our house used to be one that got mopped like every six months. 😬😅 Since this lil dude arrived? Weekly.I use this on our hardwoods, linoleum, and ceramic tile. It works really well on the hard wood and linoleum. The tile does ok, but I can tell that I will likely eventually have to scrub the grout separately.My one complaint: i noticed it was harder to push the mop down on one side compared to the other. The edges of my mop cloth on that side have frayed and torn because I was stubborn / naive and thought “It just needs to be broken in. We shall persist as auntie Elizabeth tells us…” Bad idea in this instance. I can mend the cloth so it’ll be alright. I know I will just have to be less forceful than in the future.It’s worth it. One star got knocked off because I don’t think many folks will be as inclined as I am to mend a torn cloth for mopping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It rinses in clean water, not dirty
reviews.reviewText: We like the way this functions in that it separates the dirty water from the clean water. Very unique system. We use it to clean our tile floors. would recommend it to anyone.

The media could not be loaded. Reading all the bad reviews on the handle almost scared me off of this product but then I recalled the tide pod challenge and decided to chance it.Lo and behold, if you actually assemble it correctly, you’ll find the handle is plenty strong. I’m 6’3” 275lbs. I think if it’s strong enough for me, it’s strong enough for you. Just make sure you read the instructions and for you crayon eaters, look at the pictures. There’s no hope for you tide pod eaters, just buy a wood mob and don’t burn what brain cells you have left.I use this to clean the floor in my Snap-On truck. The floor is full of mud and dirt this time of year and I can clean the entire floor like new with only one bucket. Traditional mops, I have to change the water 3 times and it still dries dirty.
